content.rendered:
Directed by M. Muthaiah

Written by M. Muthaiah

Cast Arundhati (Selvam’s Wife). Manoj K. Bharathi (Muthukutty). Manoj Bharathiraja (Muthukutty). Ilavarasu (Sangaiya).Indhumathi. Indraja (Kolavikkal). Karthi (Viruman). Karunas (Balu). Raj Kiran (Niraipandiyan Thevar). Nandhini Myna (Muthukutty’s Wife). Saranya Ponvannan (Muthulakshmi). Prakash Raj (Muniyandi). Rajkumar (Ilango (Viruman’s Third Brother)). Aditi Shankar (Thaenmozhi). Singampuli (Thalaiyaari). Soori (Kuthukkal). G.M. Sundar (MLA Pathinettaampadiyan). O.A.K. Sunder (Kuthalam Thevar). R.K. Suresh (Soonapona). Vadivukkarasi (Muniyandi’s Mother). Vasumithra (Selvam (Viruman’s First Brother))

Languages Tamil

Producers Jyotika. Suriya

Production 2D Entertainment
